title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Design Based on Higher Education Competency Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Enhances mathematical domain competence and self-regulated learning skills through project-based performance in a digitally supported environment.

learning_goals: Within three months, learners can diagnose their mathematical problem-solving competencies with 80% accuracy using competency-based self-assessment tools.
Learners improve learning efficiency by 30% through four or more cycles of self-regulated learning planning and execution over six months.
Learners can revise and supplement their competency development plans by incorporating peer reviews and instructor feedback during PBL project execution.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
